awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: In occupied France during the WWII, a German officer is murdered. The collaborationist Vichy government decides to pin the murder on six petty criminals. Loyal judges are called in to convict them as quickly as possible.

title: Special Section
